title: Tomáš Borek
text:
Tomáš Borek (born 4 April 1986) is a professional <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player, who currently plays for FC Horky nad Jizerou.
Career.
Borek scored 7 goals in 29 appearances for <a href="FK%20Dukla%20Prague">FK Dukla Prague</a> in the <a href="2012%E2%80%9313%20Gambrinus%20liga">2012–13 Gambrinus liga</a>.
Borek signed a three-year contract with Konyaspor in the summer of 2013.
